commentBody: What a life he had.......it mirrors the history of basketball!  I'm so glad he eventually tho' belatedly got his due by being inducted into the Hsll of Fame. This journalistic story is deserving of an award itself for chronicling such a wonderful human story. Too often stories whether about sports or any subject are focused on a narrow time frame, leaving out the historical context which is often richer than the day-to-day narrative.
